column6: The Shi'Ar Empire is crumbling at the hands of Vulcan! The X-Men, with Professor X captured, search for the one group of heroes that can save them and all of the Shi'Ar...the Starjammer
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
